actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Powerplant and Industrial Fuel Use Act relating to electric utility compliance options.
subjects: Conversion of electric power plants to coal
subjects_top_term: Conversion of electric power plants to coal

summary.text: Amends the electric utility system compliance option requirements of the Powerplant and Industrial Fuel Use Act of 1978 to: (1) extend the date for the submission of the system compliance plan required under such Act from January 1, 1980 to December 31, 1980; (2) extend the date for converting electric utility powerplants from using natural gas from 1990 to 1995; and (3) to increase from 20 percent to 50 percent the percentage of gas-fired powerplants owned or operated by an electric utility which must be converted by such date.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Powerplant and Industrial Fuel Use Act relating to electric utility compliance options.
